name: Kori Anderson
text:
DO NOT BUY FROM AMERICAN FREIGHT IN MONTGOMERY! They are very unprofessional and unorganized. We bought basically a whole house worth of furniture, when it was time for delivery they informed us that our sectional was not in stock and that it’ll be in stock in 2 weeks and that they’ll deliver it out to us with no delivery fee but we could still get our bedroom suite that we ordered.
Incident #1: On delivery day I had to call and ask what time would the furniture be in because we were out running errands. They forgot to put our furniture on the truck and the delivery people had to come back and get it🙄 (I’m sure if I had not called I would not have known)
Incident #2:Two weeks later, which was on yesterday (Sunday) at around 12pm I called and spoke with OJay and asked was our furniture in. She told me yes(why didn’t they call?) and that they can deliver it out same day. Okay cool. She then called back and said that we didn’t pay all of our delivery fee which in fact when they delivered our furniture the first time my boyfriend gave them the delivery free PLUS A TIP. She then told me that it was okay and that they would take care of it. Later that day, at 4pm, I called again just checking to see what time they would be coming. The guy I spoke with asked would I be okay with getting it delivered first thing Monday morning. Uhh no. (My problem with this was WHY DIDN’T ANYBODY CALL, I would be okay if they had the common courtesy to inform me of any issues instead of me having to call them.) The guy told me my furniture should be at my house no later than 10:45AM(I didn’t know how if they opened at 11am) I asked was he sure and he said yes.
SO THIS MORNING MY FURNITURE WAS NOT AT MY HOUSE AT 10:45! I called promptly AT 11am and spoke w/ the manger Rodney and he informed me that a driver was on the way to get my furniture to deliver it. If my furniture was not able to be at my house at 10:45AM they should have communicated that with me. I received my furniture at 12pm after all the mess I had to go through. I appreciate it if you guys would be more professional with your customers and communicated more with your drivers. I should not have to go through this hassle of getting furniture delivered and I WILL NOT shop with you guys again. Have a good day!!

name: Rachel Bu
text:
TL/DR: furniture took more than 2 months to arrive, company was no help over the phone, leather sectional arrived with corner scuffed. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

Full story: I shopped at American Freight on Black Friday 2017 with high expectations after reading these reviews. And the experience in the store was fine. No pressure to buy, but a helpful staff answering any questions my husband or I had. We bought a sectional and ottoman set we liked even though they weren't available for delivery for 2-3 weeks. We were fine with the delay and left looking forward to it arriving in a few weeks (more time to find homes for our old stuff).

That's when the trouble started. Fast forward 4 weeks, no sectional and no call/news at all. I call the store and was told that my purchase wasn't on the truck as expected, but they would be calling other stores to see of they had it and we should hear something the next week.

Life was busy so I didn't check again for another 3 weeks. This time when I called I was told they didn't know why, but it was on back order. But it would for sure be in the next week. I again expressed by hope that it would arrive as I very much looked forward to using my furniture.

2 weeks later, no furniture.  At this point, 2 months after purchasing the furniture and as my husband and I are both active duty military and didn't have the time to go to deal with it, my mother-in-law visited the store on a Friday. She made a bit of a scene stating the facts in front of other customers, and wouldn't you know it our sectional and ottoman arrived on rush order the following Monday. Corners were scuffed in some areas, and a few tears from packing staples, but at that point we were so glad to have the furniture  and tired of dealing with the company that we accepted it anyway. I will never shop there again  and highly recommend you don't either.

name: Wes Stigsell
text:
We decided to shop here due to the great reviews and the quality furniture and a great prices . However the great reviews must be only for furniture that they have in stock. The couch and love seat we really liked was not in stock and we were told it would be two weeks until our furniture would arrive This was 15th of July. It even said August 1st on the sales receipt.  Two weeks go by and we heard nothing. We called American Freight and we were told that they don't have a date that the truck will show up it will just show up one day. Three weeks out we had heard nothing and we're told it would take 2 to 4 weeks. At this point we would of asked for a refund and shopped somewhere else but their policy states you can get a refund after 4 weeks from purchase.  Now four weeks arrives still no furniture still no date a truck will arrive.  We call on Monday with all intentions to ask for a refund and were told there is a truck and the Manger will be in on Thursday for us to get a refund. Thursday comes no phone call from American Freight we call on Friday and we're told oh your couch is here. Alot of effort on our part to find the status on our order. So after 4 weeks and several days of a family of 5 sitting on the floor since we just moved to Montgomery we have our couch and love seat. When we picked them up we told them we were still in the market for furniture and we were told to come back and they will give us a good deal for being so patient  well why not give us a deal while we were there. We won't be back.
Going back to the day we purchased the furniture the couch and love seat we wanted they actually had in the back but it was already sold to a customer who was waiting for it to be delivered some sales people were telling our sales person to just give us that one but we would not do that to someone else. So it puts into question did our furniture arrive weeks ago and they sold it to someone else it's possible especially since they could never give us a date our furniture would arrive.
We do like the furniture but if you shop here and they don't have it in stock BEWARE you will never know when you will get it.

resp.text: We do apologize for the inconvenience, Wes. If there's anything we can do to rectify the situation, feel free to send us an email to social@ameircanfreight.us. Thanks!

name: Sylver Hooks
text: A few months ago, my husband and I purchased a dinette set from this location. When it was delivered, the delivery guy Preston had noticed they sent the wrong chairs but I had noticed the box with the table looked as if it had fallen off of the truck or dropped from a distance. After bringing in the table, they left and came back with the correct chairs. After putting together the chairs, I opened the box containing the table and it had indeed been dropped. It was well after store hours at this point but I still called the delivery guy with my issues. The next morning at 11 sharp, I got a call from the owner. Like he has obviously done before, apologized for it and said that he's send another out by the end of the day. TWO DAYS later, the table finally arrived. They opened the box to make sure that nothing is busted up and I was very pleased with the way it was handled. I was so pleased that we decided to order two more chairs from them. We were told that it took 2 weeks for the chairs to arrive. It was November 27th and we needed them before Christmas. Before they ordered the chairs, we had to pay and that wasn't an issue for us. We paid the full balance of nearly $180 for two Madrid. counter height chairs. Two weeks go by and no chairs. I was told that the truck hasn't come in but I'll definitely have them before Christmas. December 22nd, I gave them another call and I was told that I could pick them up the next day. I was overjoyed to hear that. On the 23rd I got a call from the manager telling me to not come because they wasn't there and he didn't want me to ride there for nothing. He said that he was just have them delivered when they came in. The delivery guy Preston brought to our home at 6pm that night. He told me that they were in a different box because they opened it to make sure that they sent the right chairs because of what happened the first time. Trusting his words, i signed for it then took them upstairs myself. I placed them in a closet, grabbed my things and left home until Saturday night. Christmas morning I pulled out the box, opened it and removed all of its contents. I then took the box to the dumpster. When I returned, I settled myself down to begin assembling the chairs only to find that the chairs HAD ONCE BEEN ASSEMBLED. There were marks on the chairs, the screws were stripped and rusty. and the floor protectors were very worn. There were also four screws missing as well. There were hand smudges all over the wood. There was nothing about those chairs that said NEW. In complete disbelief that Rodney the store manager for charge me full price for two chairs off the showroom floor then have me wait nearly a month to receive them made me a bit irate. Without thinking, I called the store on Christmas morning. After realizing, I messaged the delivery asking for the cell number of the manager and I've yet to receive an response. So as a result, I feel it's very necessary to be waiting in the parking lot with two unassemble Madrid counter height chairs and several questions that gonna require an answer as well as a solution. Until this, I thought very highly of American Freight and its coworkers. Now it's BUYERS BEWARE... there's a reason they say that all sales are finals. For me, I don't want my money back because I do want the chairs. I just want what I paid for and I DID NOT pay for recycled chairs

resp.text: We're very sorry to hear this happened to you, Sylver. If there's anything we can do for you, feel free to email us at social@americanfreight.us. Thanks!

We called and asked for a replacement in October. We just got the new replacement in yesterday. Which they never called my husband and told him... It is already falling apart!!!! After sitting on it two times! The expensive warranty does not cover anything other than spills and tares. It does not cover anything structural about the furniture... This furniture is only for looks not for actual use!

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text:
My eldery mother and i were just there yesterday looking at some furniture and i did
Not like our experience there at all. The salesman who served us had these real long dreadlocks and his salesmanship skills were the pits...he did not sale my mom and i what we wanted, what we liked nor did he offer to
Show us anything decent that would also fit
In our budget. Yes thats right he never showed us anything on sale nor did he bother to ask what our spending limit was so he know what to work with. Instead he just showed us around the store that highlighted
The furniture with the 699 and up prices.
We spotted a black leather sofa that had 398 price tag on it, sat on it to try it out, and as we began to show insterest in it and began discussing to each other about maybe we should get this or not. Thats when the salesman kinda brushed us away from the actual sofa set that we were sitting on that was 398 and started reverting us back toward that 699 plus tax sofa set. Smh thats not the sofa set we wanted or was discussing.we felt that the salesman wasnt offering us what we wanted but yet offer us what he wanted us to buy.....and we are the customers...its our money not his....we felt like our wants were disreguarded so we decided to check another store, told the guy we were gonna check somewhere else also before we decide. Asked him for a bussiness card and of course he didnt want to give us one and by him doing so gave us even more reason to be absolutely sure that we dont want to shop there now.
So as we started to walk out the door the guy then decided to offer us a deal on a sofa set
...A BETTER PRICE is what he said so im like oh ok he wants to work a deal on the actual leather sofa we were sitting on with the 398 price tax. So im like ok turn around and ask what are you offering...he reply...600 right now walk out..we refused and left and went somewhere else because once agin the guy was still attempting to sale us what he wanted us to buy rather than what we the customer wanted to spend our money on...

A few days later I was able to go try it out and was able to purchase at an incredible price. Their financing option made it possible for me to also get a mattress for my guest room as well. My shopping experience was very pleasant and easy. I highly recommend Mattress Firm to anyone looking for the Intellibed or any other mattress out there.

text: My husband and I went in to buy a mattress and ended up buying three! Alex helped us by explaining to us all the options available. He was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. We highly recommend this business!

name: Tiffany McNair
text:
We walked in at 5:30pm on Sunday and were the only people in the store, so obviously we got plenty of attention.  What made it 5 star worthy was the overall experience.  We came in looking for a hybrid mattress due to all the rave reviews we had seen and heard.  Alex started us off on what I would consider mid grade mattresses.  He took us over to the TempurPedics next.  I know what you're thinking because we thought the same thing.  While the TempurPedic was nice, so was it's price tag.  I compliment Alex, he definitely did his best to try and sell us on that particular mattress.  When we would try others in the store, he wouldn't talk bad about them per say, but he also wasn't singing their praises as loud.  However, once we told him our financial situation he was a complete gentleman about it and began telling us the great things about the mattresses we were testing.  When we found the one we purchased Alex was super complimentary about it and raved about our choice.

Shopping for large purchases can be so stressful and overwhelming. I kind of equate mattress stores with furniture stores and car lots.  I don't like being rushed or hassled the entire time, but I do like attention when I have questions or want opinions.  If we had to do it all over again, I can guarantee you we would return to Mattress Firm and ask for Alex.  He assisted when needed, gave exceptional customer service and made the process smooth and worry free.

If you go to this location you are in good hands and won't regret it.

Hey Cate, if you're bill is different than what you were quoted in-store, we'd like to help. Please email us at socialcare@mfrm.com with the Subject Line as Your Name/Google Review (city/state) the following information:

--Order number
--Name on order
--Store location of purchase
--Original quote versus actual quote
--Best phone number
--Best email address
--Preferred method of contact
--Best time frame and day of the week to be reached

We look forward to working towards a solution together,
Megan

name: Jama Hoffman
text: I emailed the store about what I was looking for, got Reggie, who promptly emailed me back with pictures and prices of things I might like. When I came to the store, unannounced, he took his time with my husband and I, showing us what we told him we were interested in finding for our new home. I never felt pressured. I ended up buying a sectional and 4 barstools from him and he surprised me by delivering the stools a day early, with fabric samples for outdoor furniture I was wanting to purchase, but thought I would have to make the hour drive over and back to look at samples. He sent the ones I mentioned to him in an email with the delivery men so I could match them to my current color scheme and  then call and order it over the phone. They have given me exemplary customer service, the best prices of anyone I have shopped with and have earned my business for all the other needs I have for this retirement home. My daughter was the one who referred me to them, having received the same treatment when she purchased a new sofa for her home. They are the best!

text:
The kind of customer service that makes you cringe.

text:
My wife and I visited this store Tuesday March 30 at 1:00pm. Strolled through the entire store without not one hello from any employee.
I don't understand why you would spend so much money on advertising to get floor traffic when you don't even acknowledge a potential customer?

resp.text:
Gerald,
We hate to hear about this experience.  We are looking at video to see where the breakdown occurred because that is not typical.   We do provide a non-pressure environment and received a complaint just last week from a customer because he felt we asked if he had any questions or needed any assistance too many times in his opinion, but in this case low pressure was taken too far.   If you could provide any more details via email to support@stockandtrade.com so that we can look into it further would be greatly appreciated.  I sincerely apologize and hope that you will give us another chance to show you what we have to offer.

name: Ms. Barbara
text:
UPDATED 3/17/21

My husband and I made a purchase at this store on 2/27/21. The parking was adequate and the store was clean. The staff was not strictly adhering to covid protocols. My salesman took his mask off several times.

The salesman who assisted us was a bit pushy and distracted. My husband felt insulted by some of the salesman's comments that were intended to be funny. The salesman refused to give us clear price information even when I specifically asked him to, so the price we paid ended up being more than what the salesman quoted (which ticked me off). We almost left without buying anything. I actually regret going through with the purchase.

The items were delivered on time and in good condition on 3/5/21. The delivery guys were pleasant and professional. They set up our new bed quickly and efficiently.

After posting a negative review we were contacted by a manager outside of the Jasper store. She apologized and issued a refund for an erroneous charge. She also helped us return some items. However, it was uncomfortable returning the items to the Jasper store with our salesman present.

Overall, we might shop at Mattress Firm again, but probably not the Jasper location.

resp.text: Ms. Barbara I apologize sincerely for your negative experience. Please contact the store 205-384-4107 and leave your name and contact information and leadership will contact you back.

name: Jerica Ware
text:
I cannot say enough about the most amazing customer service we received from Jack at Matress Firm Jasper! My boyfriend and I both highly value and place much importance on6 y quality customer service. We felt our shopping experience here deserved an excellent review!

We received the BEST customer service and HIGHLY RECOMMENDED visiting Matress Firm Jasper if you are in search of a new matress!!

We were so kindly greeted as soon as we walked through the door by Jack. He was very friendly, professional yet personable and extremely knowledgeable about what the store had to offer. We had an idea of the type of mattress we wanted but it's always been, at best, a good "guess" when purchasing mattresses at other stores in the past...and this time we wanted to get it right!
Jack began by asking us a few questions, using the coolest visual to help break down the basics of where to start when looking for a new matress, and got to know a little more about us, then led us straight to the floor.

I've never had a matress shopping "experience", and Jack definitely took customer service to the next level! He didn't leave us to aimlessly wander about the store, instead he led us to the matt⁵,resses to test  based on our interests. Then after explaining  the features and benefits of each matress as well as what to look/feel for when testing them, he allowed us time to lbcomfortable and take as much time as we needed.
After testing about 3 to 4 matresses, we chose the exact one Jack knew, himself, that we would enjoy the most all along! (Best part of it all...we were definitely not planning on actually purchasing a matress that exact evening...more to just look around).

resp.text: Thank you so much Jerica!!!!!

text: My wife and I were shopping for a new Tempur-Pedic mattress. We have researched online and a few other retail locations. He asked us some questions about what we were sleeping on now and what we were looking towards. He showed us several beds, and explained the features and benefits if each one. He demonstrated each bed and how the remote feature worked with the mattresses.  He answered all of our questions and some we didn't know to ask. We were so impressed with the mattress and base and the purchase price. We purchased a Tempur-Proadapt medium hybrid mattress (queen size) and Tempur-Ergo 2.0 adjustable base. I will recommend Mattress Firm and Mr. Tidwell to all of my friends in the market for a great bed and an even better buying experience.

text: Trying to return mattress but reimbursement quite a bit more than the salesman indicated when I purchased.  So be sure to get all the details on return and read the small print on your contract.  The salesman must have repeated 10 times, "you can return within a 100 days but there is a $200 fee for pickup"  My reimbursement is about $400 less than what I paid.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your feedback, Ouida. We provide this information on our website, at the register in each of our stores, and on the receipt we ask you to review and sign once you complete your order, so this information should have been provided in your paperwork. This is why we ask our owners to sign their receipts confirming that they have read and understood all of the terms and conditions. If you have any questions we can help with, please give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 from 8AM-8PM CST M-F.

name: Logan Brown
text: I don't usually write reviews, but I had too for this one! I had dealt with Veronica Turner, and she was nothing short of exceptional! From the minute I walked in she was very helpful. She showed all my options (it was all neatly arranged and the store had a easier layout then the other furniture store I went too first). I had plans to go to a few more stores after this to look around, but I didn't! She was great to deal with and very helpful. I was in and out in around 20 minutes! Picked out my bedroom set, got approved for the great financing offer they had going on, and set up my delivery. I highly recommend asking for Veronica!

resp.text: We’re thrilled to receive such positive feedback regarding your Havertys purchase! Thank you for sharing your experience with Veronica and we hope you enjoy your new bedroom set.

text: The saleswoman was very attentive to our needs

name: Brenda Chisholm
text: Went in looking for a specfic cabinet but didn't find it however we did find a beautiful dining room set.  Tashayla was a big help in our decision to buy she was very helpful and informative.  We had to go home and measure our room to make sure we had enough room for dining set comfortably.  Upon reentering the store to make the purchase final Tashyla saw my husband an I and meet us and ask "is it going to work for you?"  We purchased and are excitedly awaiting our delivery on Wednesday.  It was a pleasure to do business with Havertys.

name: J Schleigh
text: Nice people. Good service. Need better pricing for a Labor Day sale.

name: Angela Weaver
text: After being charged $300 for delivery I was told that it wouldn't  be a problem to receive deliver of my furniture after 4:00 pm on Monday, after I got home from work, then found out that, that was not true when an automated system called to confirm the deliver between 9:00 am and 2:00 pm. After speaking with Darwin the salesman we had initial dealt with I was told it was because they only deliver to baldwin county on Mondays and that there was no way to say what exact time they would show up. So if you live anywhere in baldwin county or further I would definitely not suggest doing business with them. Also it seems like they will say whatever to make the sale and get you on the hook. $300 for delivery???? That's insane especially for the terrible service I have gotten with trying to nail down a time for delivery. For the price it is not worth the headache

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at Azalea Center. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (251) 341-3349. We look forward to hearing from you.

text: Your welcome

resp.text: Hi Taraneshia, we are glad we could help! We hope to see you soon!

resp.text: Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day!

name: Laura Stevens
text:
When spending thousands of dollars on furniture you would expect professional, reliable service. I was very disappointed with our store visit over the weekend dealing with a manager on duty who quoted us Havertys policies and procedures.
Now our delivery is 4 hours late ( past the 3 hour window) I only found this out because I called to check the status of the delivery. I will be having my furniture delivered after 9pm (3:45- 5:45  was orginal time window) which is unexceptable! While on the phone with customer service I was quoted Havertys policies around delivery and promised a delivery time of 7:40 pm.  It is now 9pm and they still have not showed up and customer service is closed. If I could do over I would have spent our money elsewhere. What should have been a fun buying experience has been a stressful one.  I do not recommend Haverty's and will not be buying from this company again.

name: Sandra James
text: Great customer experience!!!

resp.text: Sandra, we are delighted to hear that you had a great shopping experience with our team! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Joseph Johnson
text: The store is well-kept and apt for the hoity toity for sure but, only those that wish to decorate for neutral, bland palettes. Perfect for the suburban Xerox copy family looking to "blend-in" not for an urban stylistic leaning preference.

name: Gecki
text: Urban Home Market is a wonderful resource for great selection of quality furniture and accessories at reasonable prices.  After shopping for dining tables all over Birmingham, we finally bought one at Urban Home and are very happy with it.  Shannon was knowledgeable and helpful, and the delivery guys were also great.  Thank you, Urban Home!

name: Melanie O'Keefe
text: I went in to buy some chairs. I asked the price of a chair and purchased 2. They delivered the wrong chairs. Luckily I had taken a picture of the chair. After a long back and forth the sales person had sold me the wrong chairs. They said they would honor the price and order me the chairs as they didn’t have any in the warehouse. They said it would be 8 weeks. I called 7 weeks later to check on the status. Apparently they never placed the order. Its beyond belief how much they screwed up. They lost a good customer forever!

name: Erin
text: During the pandemic it was difficult to shop for furniture. Urban Home was incredibly helpful and professional. They had a beautiful selection and went out of their way to make it easier for us during such a trying time to move.

name: Dianne Scott
text: Excellent service, good selection of furniture and good prices.

name: Michael Garrett
text: Neat place. A lot of stylish home goods. My wife enjoys the store very much. A friendly, helpful staff. Prices seem a bit high to me, just an opinion.

name: jim lawrence
text: Employee westley is a theif

name: Vicki Everett
text:
As you enter the door of Urban Home, a warm welcome is awaiting you with talented designers ready to create a new home environment for your
needs! We are the receipent of a lovely new room in our home designed by Urban Home and spend many peaceful hours enjoying it! Stop by today and enjoy their Thanksgiving and holiday decorating ideas and head home with new ideas and new decorating items to add more warmth and love to your home !

name: Tommy Barrows
text: Such a large selection. Beautiful pieces. Wonderful staff. Don't miss the close out room in the back right corner for deep discount deals. Ask for Drew, he's one of the buyers and decorators, fabulous!

name: Caroline Lowe
text: Urban Home is the epitome of southern elegance. The staff is incredibly helpful and welcoming. Each visit is a new experience and like coming into your own home. I would recommend Urban Home Market to anyone who wants to bring Southern Class into their home.

text:
I love this store! Emily has helped us design our home! We could not be more pleased with the furniture selection, the service, and the kindness and knowledge of all the employees .
It is a place worth your time to visit!

name: Deby Tooker
text: Nice living room offerings but I was disappointed by the lack of bedroom furniture. The staff was friendly and the store was clean. This is a good place to shop for living room furniture and accessories.

name: Josh Hall
text:
The Urban team are very professional, knowledge, courteous and a hell of alot of fun!!!
Emily has an incredible taste level and we are very excited how she is putting our new home together!

name: Amy Baker
text: This place, located at Lee Branch by Hobby Lobby, has consistently impressive interior design pieces such as tables, chairs, mirrors, lamps, chandeliers, etc. —-some styles rustic and some more contemporary —Also, this store has ever-changing home decor knick knacks such as pillows, wall hangings, tableware, etc. Has appropriately helpful associates who are not pushy.

name: Allan Scott
text: Not one person who was working in the store even spoke. I've read this about the store before I experienced it myself. Beautiful furniture and artwork. I'll be buying my furniture where I live in Buckhead, GA. Missed opportunity for this store.

The monthly payments are very reasonable.  I will recommend Babcock to everyone I know that's in need of furniture and more.  Thank you all so much

text: I have been looking for a specific Samsung refrigerator for 5 months and no one had it in stock. I called Badcock in Opp, Al and talked to an associate who took the time to check inventory in other stores. This took me to the Bay Minette, Al store and an associate there found the refrigerator in stock at the Thomasville store. Had it not been for their willingness to take the time to check for me I would not have been able to get the appliance I had been searching for! Kudos to Badcock for having excellent customer service. My experience and transaction with Shawn at the Thomasville store was flawless! Class act!!!

resp.text: Hi, Shay. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. We're honored you gave us the opportunity to help with your refrigerator!

text: It was a good experience and I found what I as looking for.

text: I visited Badcock’s store in Thomasville, AL today with my sons. We were not greeted or acknowledged the whole time we walked around looking at furniture. So we decided to leave. Upon mentioning this to my mother, I found out that my father had the same experience. Very unprofessional.

resp.text: Hi, Lisa. We sincerely apologize for the experience you described. Customer service is very important to us, and our Corporate Team would like to look into this further. When you have a moment, please give us a call at 1-800-223-2625.

name: Big EL
text: Pretty good selection. They had some sales going and we bought 2 coaches. Very pleased with the quality and price. Only issue was they were a day late on the delivery , which had us sitting in the floor for 2 nights.

text: We have done business with Badcock Furniture for several years now and we are very satisfied with the quality of  our purchases and with the customer service we receive. Will definately continue to shop here in the future

text: My husband and have always been very pleased with the exceptional customer service we receive from the Thomasville location.  The entire staff are polite, friendly and knowledgeable.  When we are in need of furniture they have a great selection to choose from and we always fine what we need.  We will never go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share your experience, Kathryn! It's always a pleasure to have you shop with us, and your kind words mean so much.

name: judy maharrey
text:
For a Christmas gift I purchased my husband Paul a recliner. Since that time his back and hip pain worsened to the point that he needed a doctor.
I put him in my recliner which I purchased from badcocks but different make and he’s more comfortable and the pain lessened.
I’m wondering what your policy is for replacing this chair. I’m a faithful Babcock customer and would like to continue to be.
Thank you and God Bless!

resp.text: Hi Judy. Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. We're sorry to hear about your husband's pain. Please reach out to our Customer Care team at 1-800-223-2625 to see what options might be available.

name: Faye Anderson
text: Love Badcocks and the people that work in the Thomasville, Al store, but when we sent in our payment we accidentally sent one dollar short. Just an oversight on our part. They called and told us we would have to get there and pay that one dollar or we would have to pay the high interest. So my husband drives 25 miles one way to pay this one dollar. Seems to me that someone in tthat store would have sacrificed one dollar to save us a long trip. I know I would certainly have done that for my good customers. We would have certainly paid them back when we had to go to town. Sigh.... just saying. 😪

resp.text: Hi, Faye. We're so sorry to hear you had to drive the unexpected 25 miles. While we hope you don't have to encounter this again, we want to make you aware of other payment options that might be more convenient. We recommend trying our online payment service, pay-by-phone automated line, or simply calling our credit team at 1-877-706-8959. Thank you for being our loyal customer. We appreciate YOU!

text: Marcus was awesome at helping us with our purchase

name: Camerisa Harris
text: I went into the Helena, AL store and Marcus was really helpful by assisting me with finding exactly what I  was searching for. He also helped me pick out accessories to compliment my sofa and chair. If you are searching for furniture at a reasonable price, go see Marcus in Helena.

name: Anquenetta Mcadams
text: Walked in to get my son a bed and mattress, this was not my first time purchasing from A F. I also have my king size bedroom set from them. Excellent customer service, very friendly staff and fast service. Thank you American Freight in Helena.

name: KRISSY HIGGINS
text: I ordered furniture at Helena store around end of April 2021. Told furniture would be in May 28. Well May 28 and no furniture. They told me truck does not even deliver until June 9. Finally got order a few days after and it was missing a dresser. I was told it is in Tuscaloosa by mistake. They will go get it. When I get home 1 dresser is damaged. I send pictures to email per Marcus requested. 2 weeks later still no missing dresser or reply about damaged dresser. They tell me that the Forest dale store location has 2 dressers I can go there and get them and bring damage dresser to them. Chasity at Forest dale store is amazing. She was a great help to get this taken care of for me. Although when I get home 1 of the 2 dressers is damaged. Now what? Guess I have to figure how to make defective dresser be ok. I'm not driving a hour back over there for more defective furniture. Never settle for the cheaper price. My granny always said you pay for what you get..

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please reach out to the Store Manager at 205-624-4444 to discuss  your experience.

name: Gwendolyn Ivy
text: I purchased a sectional for my den and sofa and love seat for my living room. All pieces were supposed to be delivered on 6/19/2021. I was quoted a delivery fee of 175 because it was coming from Tuscaloosa. Well due to the weather, I received a call at 7pm stating my sectional would be delivered between 12-6on 6/20/2021. When I required about my sofa and loveseat...it's not on this delivery. I was informed I would have to pay another delivery fee for something I had no control over. I have been calling the Helena store since 7:02pm and the line has been busy. I am beyond upset and I am not happy.

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. Please reach out to the Store Manager at 205-624-4444 to discuss your experience.

name: Emily Conklin
text: Great, friendly service and I'm always immediately greeted as I come through the door! Everyone is very helpful, and the prices are well worth it. Will definitely make them my go-to :)

name: OtterFaceGirl
text: Marcus Reaves is a great store manager who maintains professionalism while offering impeccable customer service. He is extremely knowledgeable on all of the products offered and answered all of my questions thoroughly. I was able to get everything I needed quickly and easily. I will definitely return in the future.

name: Jacinta Brock
text: Marcus is the absolute best. I came in to the store with an idea of what I wanted. He lead me in the right direction. He even got all of my items deliverd the same day before closing. Best customer service. I will continue to use him for all my furniture needs.

name: Jason Ford
text: Service was great, until they got my signature on everything. We were ASSURED that they can get it on the car and make sure that it wasn't going to move...AT ALL. After I signed for everything, everyone walked away. I had to ask for help to put the mattress on the car and then had to tie it down by myself. Not sure that we will be back for a second experience at this place. Honesty goes a VERY long way with me.

resp.text: Hello Jason, we are sorry to hear about your recent shopping experience. Input about our stores and employees helps improve customer satisfaction and we aim to please. Please call (740)833-6396 so we can put you in direct contact with the Regional Manager of the store location you recently visited. Thank you.

name: Latoya Eaton
text: I bought my daughter a bedroom set, and it’s perfect! Marcus was really helpful and knowledgeable in helping us choose the right one for her. He made sure the delivery and setup was on time and efficient. I have told my family and friends if they need furniture to go see Marcus at American Freight in Helena, he’ll take good care of you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business!

name: Sierra Cordrey
text: Marcus was an absolute pleasure to work with. He assisted me with my financing app as well as any questions I had. If you want great customer service this is the place to come!

name: Phillip Gillen
text: Awesome group to work with. Good prices and quick service! Even loaded everything for me.

name: Brittney Young
text: Marcus showed great patience with us all while still handing what he currently had going on. He is awesome and great representation of your company.

name: Margaret Parrish
text: Marcus was a tremendous help in choosing a recliner for a friend who was injured in a fall. I will definitely be back again.

name: Shaun Thomas
text: The customer service I received at the Helena store was nothing less than exceptional. I would recommend anyone to visit the store.

Definitely coming back to visit I guys.

This was the main reason we purchased from this company.
1 1/2 years later we find out that none of these things are actually covered under the plan.

We feel we were intentionally misled into paying for a useless service.

Do your business with a company of integrity, but not American Freight of Helena.

name: Vivacious Criss
text:
I been a customer every since 2019. Back when Cory and delivery man Lorenzo was there. No problems. My husband purchased the Raspberry Bedroom set. He asked Marcus for the complete set. Marcus was too busy inquiring who my husband was buying the bedroom suit for. That he didn't disclose the set only includes one nightstand. Usually a Queen size bed set has two parties. My husband spent $1,333.16, plus $200.00 for delivery. Just to find out there's only one nightstand.  I called Darnell who accuses me of yelling and I can't fix it, if you don't stop. All bets were off when he made the comment that my husband and I should have looked online.  To see what the order details. Voices on both sides got loud, and Darnell laughs and hangs up. So, if you go to a restaurant, you should already know what's on the menu.  I will not be back and I'm telling my family members who shop here too. Don't!!

Just want to inform the Regional Manager that a paid in full Bedroom Set and Set up, plus tip. A paid in full order that was supposed to be delivered all on Tuesday. The Chess part that they didn't have Tuesday 06/30/2020, and MARCUS said would come Wednesday 07/01/2020, the deliveryman told us 8:30p.m. he was still coming. Only not too show up. And my husband and I didn't get to bed until 12:00a.m., and husband had to be at work 5:00 a.m. the next morning. So, we are going on the third day 07/02/2020, waiting on our $200.00 Raspberry chest, just to call all day. The deliverymen arrived 11:20 p.m., threw the chess down, that was paid to be assembled and left. Need I say more.

text: They had terrible delivery service 3  yrs ago, but I gave them a 2nd chance. Nothing has changed. Still terrible. They gave me a 8am-5pm delivery window. At 10am, they called to make sure I was home for delivery. They claimed they had my furniture on the truck for days (I bought it on Friday and they don't deliver on weekends). They said they had been calling me several times. I had 2 missed calls and 1 voicemail (I called back as soon as I got the voicemail). At 1pm, I called to get a status and they said delivery between 12pm-5pm. At 4pm, they called to see if they could deliver. They said they called several times, with messages and a text. 2 calls is not several, 1 voicemail which I returned promptly and no text. Furniture is nice enough, but will never use their delivery again.

text: Terribly awful experience!! First off, if Marcus is your salesperson expect absolutely nothing to get done or be done right. I ordered a bedroom and living room set over a month ago to be delivered on June 26th. All of my furniture didn't arrive on time... I still haven't received my living room furniture nor an update on when it's expected to arrive. I finally cancelled the order and asked for a refund yesterday. When my bedroom furniture did arrive, the wrong chest was delivered. Also, Marcus claims he forgot to include my bedrails and I didn't have screws for my headboard. The delivery fee was $100, with no assembly. I had to drive back to the store for my bedrails. No considerations nor accommodations were made for me regarding my time or gas even though this order was paid in full and this was a mistake he made. As of yesterday, he still could not give me an update on the status of my living room furniture. I finally spoke with the manager who was unaware of this situation and told me that my complaint was one of many and that Marcus had been demoted. However, this doesn't change the fact that I've been in my house for almost a month with no living room furniture and they've had the payment in full long before I even closed on my house. DON'T ORDER ANYTHING FROM HERE!

name: Adam Huddleston
text:
We bought a new sofa/loveseat combo from them. The pricetag was certainly lower than anywhere else we looked, and it looked like OK quality furniture.
Less than 3 weeks after purchase, the sofa literally fell apart. We're pretty normal sized people and have treated it with care. I turned it over and opened up the upholstery to have a look.  The construction quality is the worst I've ever seen; low grade partical board, half-rotted knotty 1/2" thick pine, and the whole thing is held together with staples.  I identified 6 separate joints that had come apart inside the couch due to the staples simply slipping out of the wood, and many more that were halfway undone.
I ended up taking around 3 or 4 hours and meticulously replacing pieces, reinforcing joints with metal brackets and screws, and closing up places in the upholstery which were mysteriously split and leaking stuffing.

The furniture here is truly of the lowest quality, even if it appears fine on the surface.  If you buy from here, make sure you also purchase their ridiculously expensive warranty (that will tack on $100 - $200 to your purchase), because you're gonna be needing it a whole lot.  If you need cheap furniture, go to the thrift store or use Facebook marketplace. If you want new furniture, spring for something more expensive.

name: Givon Wayne Gilliam
text:
We bought a floor model and learned a valuable lesson. The couch with chase looked great on the showroom floor and we were very excited to get what we thought was a good deal.

In less than a year the cushions started to shred.  We do not have children and very few guests.  We are very gentle on our furniture.   To our dismay and surprise the couch covering started to disintegrate before our very eyes.   The middle cushion does not even get used at all and it was the first one to split and fray. See photo for what your couch will look like if you buy it from American Freight.

We took the cushions into the store thinking they would honor a 1 year warranty.  Unfortunately because the couch was a floor model it was an “as-is”purchase  and we were out of luck.  American Freight said that there was nothing that they could do.

Here is a warning for you.  If you decide to purchase a floor model, do not be surprised if it does not last one year.  You are buying disposable furniture.  Lesson learned.

The item we purchased was not available in our size at the Helena store, but Joey called the Trussville store to verify they had it in stock.  We were able to pick it up the next day, and everything went smoothly!  We will definitely be going back the next time we need furniture!

Martice actually drove to the Trussville location to pick up the mattress I needed and brought it back to Helena so I could surprise my daughter with her new bed on her birthday. Now THAT is CUSTOMER SERVICE at its best!!!! Thank you Martice!!

My furniture was hauled off and I have yet to hear from the Manager Alex as to how he plans on resolving this AND he still has my money!  Do NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY WITH THIS COMPANY. They are nice but do not deliver on their promises or merchandise. It’s simply a ploy to take your money then give you the round around. I left messages for the regional Manager as well with no return call either. Bad news all the way around.

name: Amy Thompson
text:
Bought (and financed) two matching recliners on July 21st of 2018. The Helena store only had one so we picked up the other from the Trussville location. Get home to find the Trussville store had given us a broken chair. We return it to the Helena store a few days later and were told they would have to order it and it could take up to 3 weeks to receive the replacement.
We have been very patient, probably to patient...Because here we are 5 months later paying on a chair/recliner that we don't have!
Through these past 5 months there have been countless attempts to reach out to the Helena location, only to be blown off by staff that insist they are oblivious to what is going on and leave me with, "I will have to call you back."
Never to be heard from again until the next time I call or reach out via the American freight website.
This situation has gone on entirely long enough! I personally do not suggest doing business with this company and if you so choose to, just remember, "buyer beware!"
