name: Michelle Owen
text: They advertise 24 months with no interest.  My husband and I picked out furniture.  We were approved for 5000 dollars.  But only 12 months no interest. We couldn’t get the 24.   If we were approved for that much why was it only for 12 months?  Our payments were gonna be over 300 dollars a month.  When we asked how much it would be with interest it was gonna be over 200 a month for 24 months.  We figured up the stuff we wanted was 3600 dollars. After paying for 2 years we would pay over 5000 dollars. Way too much interest.  They use the 24 months no interest to get you in the door then tell you you can’t get it.  Then you have to pay a lot of interest.  I guess they think if you are already in there you will go ahead and pay with interest. False advertising.  We went somewhere else and got the same amount of furniture for 128 dollars a month.

resp.text: Hi, Michelle. We're sorry we couldn't provide you with the financing terms you had hoped for, but are delighted to hear you were able to get the furniture you needed. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Linda Moore
text: I am very happy with the service this is the 2nd time I have shop with Babcock furniture. Am very happy with the service  I have no complaints. They take care of there customers just right. Thank you for the best service ever i guarantee i will be back  thank you. Again. Linda Moore

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your shopping experience, Linda! It was our pleasure to help!

name: Ronald Hill
text: Nice stuff prices are to high

resp.text: We're sorry to hear you weren't pleased with our prices, Ronald. Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback.

name: Charles Smith
text: It was great four stars definitely

resp.text: Thank you, Charles!

name: sulema corro
text: Exelen service, miss Barbara,  very nice

resp.text: Thank you, Sulema! So glad you enjoyed shopping with our team.

name: Michael Battle
text:
The service at the oxford Alabama branch sucks!!! The manager of the store is very RUDE and disrespectful to the employees. And the customers receive the same treatment.

I have never been insulted and treated so poorly. 1st....they attempted to deliver my furniture incomplete. Was going to deliver and setup the entire bedroom and make me wait 2-3 days for my mattress. Whoever heard of such a thing? If we didn’t call the day before, they would’ve done it.
2nd...the delivery was not on time and the decided to send ya a loaner mattess but instructed us to not remove the plastic and expect us to sleep on crunching plastic for 2-3 days. NOT ACCEPTABLE! 3rd....They delivered my furniture late and it was not installed and setup properly.

Their solution was a HUGE insult!!! $99 credit!!

When we called to discuss with manager, he kept passing comments and words through a sales rep and not wanting to come to phone to talk with an upset customer.

Additionally, we were told we should receive a call in a couple days from a manager that never occurred. After 3 days, we contacted corporate with same results. They told us that they will forward to a district manager and they will call us in a couple days.

This place is HORRIBLE!!! I will NEVER recommend or shop at the Oxford Alabama Branch ever again. I would pay more at another store/furniture place before going back to this store!!! If I could give negative stars, I would!!!

resp.text: Hi, Michael. We're so sorry to hear you were dissatisfied with your experience. Please know your information was shared with the District Manager as promised. We apologize for the delay in reaching out. Thank you for sharing your feedback and showing us where we have an opportunity to improve.

name: Hilda McClellan
text: The staff was friendly and very helpful!!!! Thank you 😊

resp.text: Thank you, Hilda! It was a pleasure to have you shop with us.

name: Linda Bridges
text: Best experience I have ever had in a furniture store.  Misty is AWESOME saleslady.

resp.text: Wow! We're so pleased to hear that, Linda! Thank you for sharing your feedback.

name: Jason Welsh
text: Was in and out, just had to pay my bill but everyone was nice and speedy about it.

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by, Jason! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Joe Colasacco
text: It was great we have used them for a lot  of things from Babcock over years

resp.text: Thanks for being our loyal customer, Joe! We really appreciate you!

name: Matt Humphries
text: It's an ok place to buy furniture but they will not deliver the furniture when you will be available to receive it if you are not available from the times they give you. You will be moved to another delivery day. If you ask for an after 4 delivery so you can get your stuff after work they say I can't give you a time they will call the day before delivery to give you the time if it's not convenient for you and you can't be there you get moved to another delivery day and time not very customer friendly in that area

name: Olivia Bruce
text: Great place to shop for good home furnishings

resp.text: Thank you, Olivia! We're so glad you enjoyed shopping with us.

name: Shawn Bailey
text: Wasn't impressed the prices were alot higher and you would expect for the people to ask you do you need any help but that wasn't the case. I took my business elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi, Shawn. We're sorry we didn't have what you were looking for this time. Please check back again as our sales and promotions change regularly.  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts.

name: James King
text: This is a excellent place to buy furniture and appliances. Ask for Misty and tell her James King sent you there!!!!

name: Stacie Gardner
text: It depends on the day if you'll be able to get help

name: Deidre Boyd
text: Not a big selection to choose from but friendly service.

name: Stephanie Pridmore
text: I've waiting 2 months for them to replace my couch. I called today and they didn't even have my work order on record. They already sent someone out to look at it, how do they not have my order? Expect to wait for service. Expect dates to get moved. Expect furniture to break within a few months. In total I've waited over 3 months with a broken couch. Just frustrating.

name: Daniel
text: My wife dealt with Barbara Benson, was told we could pick up furniture 5 days later, when i go to pick up she had scheduled it for 12 days later. Store manager Chris Guinther had a dont care attitude when we cancelled the order. He refused to give me his bosses phone number. These 2 are terrible stay away!

resp.text: Hi, Daniel. We're sorry to hear that this was your experience. Should you ever want to speak with a member of our Corporate Team, we always welcome the conversation. 1-800-223-2625

name: ROKK STAR
text: Super place to purchase furniture awesome customer service

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your experience and our furniture. Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback!

name: Neicey Mcneal
text: Watch it. They will tell you about a deal and only give you part of it. Smh.

name: Vicky Caldwell
text: Put in credit application.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback, Vicky! We really appreciate it!

name: Lance Folsom
text: Great people

resp.text: Thank you, Lance!

name: Stan Maynard
text: Great staff

resp.text: Thank you, Stan!

name: Rita Sexton
text: I go in there to get something put on my account cuz I was told that I had a year to get it done and come to find out somebody told me wrong it's 6 months so they lost to customer

resp.text: Hi Rita, we're sorry to hear that you've had an unsatisfactory experience at your local Badcock store. If you'd like to speak with someone directly about this, please feel free to call 1-800-223-2625 and someone from our corporate customer service team will be more than happy to discuss this with you. ~YL

name: Jason Meeder
text: Decent furniture store, nice staff

name: Linda McBrayer
text: Still have a sofa that falling apart took out an extended warranty   on it lol they say u can't make appointment for guy come look just when ever he's in area lol been waiting for 1 year and  half

name: Sully Sammy
text: Very friendly place

resp.text: Thank you, Randi! We're so glad you found our team to be friendly.

name: Amber Newborn
text: Helpful

resp.text: Thanks, Amber! It was our pleasure to help!

name: charity Singleton
text: Friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you, Charity! It was an honor to serve you.

name: Brian Newton
text: Customer service not helpful dryer been broke for 6 week  and all they can say is sorry and I bought the warranty no stars if it would let me

resp.text: Hi, Brian. We're sorry to hear about your dryer. Please accept our sincerest apologies. Our Corporate Team would be happy to look into this for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-223-2625. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

name: Jack Gilbert
text: I wandered around the showroom for 10 minutes looking out for a sales person.

name: Jill Harris
text: Awesome furniture bargains! Nice furniture and home accessories. Really nice sheet sets for great prices.👍

name: April in Alabama
text: Fun place to shop!

name: lacarla allen
text: Lovely people geat prices

resp.text: Thank you very much for this great review and we hope all the people who come into our store feel the same way. Our goal is to offer the best product at the lowest price and give good service. Thanks and we try us best to live up to this review.

name: Cheryl Cook
text: Closing

name: Bailey Fawcett
text: Had absolutely the best experience in there today! My designer, Ashley, was SO kind and attentive. I know I did not give the clearest description of what I wanted but she figured it. I couldn’t be more pleased! I am so excited for my furniture to come!

resp.text: Hi Bailey, thank you so much for your feedback! Ashley is a huge asset to our team in Hoover. She is so knowledgeable and professional. So glad to hear of your experience and we can't wait to hear of how your home turns out! Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Tava Chandler
text: I recently needed to furnish several rooms in our new home. Ashley White came to my home and listened to my needs, measured my spaces, and helped me to identify the pieces needed for each room. Ashley was very knowledgeable and helped make the process of selecting finishes and fabrics enjoyable. Her assistance helped me to be confident in my choices.

resp.text:
Hello Tava!  Thank you for taking the time to share insight regarding your experience with designer Ashley White at the Birmingham Design Center. Ashley is an exceptional designer who actively listens to understand her clients’ needs. From there, Ashley helps them navigate the many custom options while narrowing down on the functional solutions that reflect their style and design preference. Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your experience and hope that your furnishings bring you joy for many years to come!
- Birmingham Design Center

name: Cynthia Parker
text: My experience at Ethan Allen has been extremely stress free and pleasant. This is due primarily to the friendly, yet professional service of Ashley White.  Her eye for design along with her helpful guidance (actually visiting the space in my home) has made the purchase of my new bed room décor a cinch! Looking forward to purchasing more excellent quality furniture as well as working with Ashley. I appreciate the time she put into making this experience a great one!

resp.text:
Hi Cynthia! Thank You for providing insight about your experience at the Birmingham Design Center. We are so glad that you all decided to give Ethan Allen a try at earning your business. Professional Designer Ashley White actively listens to her client’s needs and concerns in order to tailor solutions that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Ashley is ecstatic that you enjoyed the design process in entirety. Cynthia, Thank You the 5-Star Rating and for choosing us to be a part of your home furnishing experience!
-Birmingham Design Center

name: Alexa Mallard
text: Ashley was a great help in finding the perfect bed to compliment our EA furniture we bought twenty years ago. She was creative and a great communicator who  helped me visualize a new look. The Hoover store was clean and had several things in place to ensure safety and health during the pandemic.

resp.text: Hi Alexa, thank you for your review. Ashley is a great asset to our team in Birmingham. Safety has always been a focus for Ethan Allen, and especially during this current challenge we are committed to keeping our staff and clients safe.  Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Mary Neil
text: Ashley was very helpful in the showroom and drawing layouts with pricing.  She reached out, was good at communicating, sharing her cell and email. Ashley made it easy and quick working on our sectional, developing the final scheme and completing pricing for our order.  We are very pleased.

resp.text: Hi Mary, thank you so much for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with Ashley at our Birmingham Design Center. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Elizabeth Reed
text: Remodeling a kitchen after a house fire is stressful, to say the least.  Our kitchen table and chairs came from Ethan Allen nearly 20 years ago so I went back to them to see if they had counter hight stools that would coordinate with existing furniture.  Ashley White knew exactly what I was looking for.  She suggested the perfect leg and finish based on a photo of my table and chairs.  Our new stools were just delivered and they are perfection!  It's always a pleasure to shop in Ethan Allen.  Thank you Ashley, for also making it fun!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for such great feedback on your experience with Ethan Allen. We are so glad you were able to work with Ashley and she took such great care of you. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: john placey
text: We have enjoyed owning Ethan Allen furniture and furnishings over the decades!  Some pieces like our dining room chairs and table still look and feel brand new even though purchased in the early 1970s!  Their staff is always friendly and helpful!  A bit pricey but we have found that you truly get to enjoy what you paid for!!!

name: Ronald Payne
text: After searching many stores, we found our perfect dining room table at our local Ethan Allen and it was on sale. The table had two leaves which would be needed to host our large family group for Thanksgiving. The sales lady was most helpful and promised that it would be delivered before Thanksgiving only about six weeks away. We were kept informed every step on the way and our table arrived four days prior to Thanksgiving. The leaves are a little hard to get in and out but that should get better with more use. We love the table!

resp.text: Ronald, I am so happy to hear about your experience! We love when the process goes smoothly. I know you will enjoy your table for many Thanksgivings to come. Thank you for reaching out to let us know, we appreciate it.

name: Catherine Benefield
text: The whole experience with Ethan Allen has been pleasant and productive. Designer Kelley Horton guided me through the process of selecting furniture (sofa, 2 chairs, ottomans) and fabrics. The furniture was delivered by professionals who NOT ONCE bumped a wall or door frame. They carefully set up the furniture and carted away the wrappings. The designer then brought paint samples and assisted in selecting a paint color for the walls. From start to finish, I was treated with professionalism and courtesy. The furniture is well made, beautiful in my home, and most importantly, comfortable. Will I purchase from Ethan Allen on Hwy. 150 in Hoover again? Absolutely.

resp.text: Hi Catherine! Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at our Hoover location. We appreciate it very much! We are pleased to hear that Kelley could make designing your home a breeze and know it MUST look beautiful. Thank you for also pointing out how amazing our delivery team was; they are quite the asset to Ethan Allen! We hope you enjoy your beautiful pieces for many years to come and appreciate your business very much.

name: Amy Rickles
text: Ashely did a great job of helping us pick a style of furniture, wood accents, and fabric. Well worth the time and money spent. Would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. Ashley is a huge asset to our Birmingham team!

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Kelly, at Ethan Allen, was so fantastic!! She took so much time out for me & assisted me with choosing the fabric for my cornices and curtains. I love my new curtains!!! The reason I rated 3 stars is because Ethan Allen is way over priced I found the same rug I was going to buy from Ethan Allen at RH for much less. I understand Ethan Allen has nice fabrics but I've seen much nicer for far less.

resp.text: Cameron, thank you so much for the feedback! I am so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your new curtains! Custom curtains can be a big project, I am so happy that Kelly was able to partner with you and design and implement something you love.

name: Pat Ford
text: Great purchasing and service experience! Ashley greeted us warmly when we arrived and quickly showed us what we were looking for and provided material samples that were perfect for our needs.  She made the whole process quick and easy.  The delivery guys were the best I have ever seen.  They  handled the new chairs and sofa with care and were careful to not damage our wood floor in moving the sofa into place.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review Pat! We're happy to hear everything went perfect during your delivery and that our team did an excellent job as well. Thanks for taking the time to write about us. We know Ashley appreciates your compliment as well!

name: Sherry Vaughn
text:
I have been buying Ethan Allen furniture for over 25 years because I know their furniture is a quality product and is timeless. But the thing that I have come to appreciate the most about Ethan Allen is their free design service. The designers know their business well and do a great job.
Kelley and Lauren with Hoover Ethan Allen have both been so helpful with my current home renovation.
I literally cannot praise Kelley Horton enough for how she has helped me to transform my home into a more modern and updated style utilizing what I currently have and incorporating new pieces to blend. She has spent countless hours  in helping me to choose the right pieces for my home including furniture, window treatments, rugs, artwork, bedding, and even down to the smallest decorative accent pieces. My home looks beautifully done with effortless design and functionality now.
The entire process from designing to delivery and installation has been very professional and I could not have asked for better.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review Sherry! It brings us so much joy to know how appreciated our brand is and that everyone on our team gives their all. Kelley goes above and beyond for her clients so we're glad to hear that you find her as special as we do! We know every detail matters and strive to ensure that our customer service is superb. Thank you again for all your kind words Sherry. Enjoy your newly renovated home!

name: Randy Mason
text: My wife and I were on vacation and staying at the hotel next door and decided to browse.  Ashley did such an awesome job reviewing and showing us the bed we looking for we bought one that day. We could have waited until we got home to Michigan but really liked the kind and genuine service that Ashley provided. That was our first time in an Ethan Allen store and we have now set up a home appointment back in Michigan. Thank you Ashley!!

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Randy! We are delighted to hear how welcoming Ashley was and greatly appreciate you stopping by. Thanks for joining the Ethan Allen family!

name: Emma Bolden
text: From browsing the store to having my pieces delivered, the entire process of buying furniture from the Ethan Allen in Hoover was a dream. We were greeted warmly as we came in the store, and designer Kelley Horton was extremely helpful and kind (and funny!). The delivery crew was prompt, respectful, and careful. An excellent experience all-around!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our Hoover location, Emma! We're happy to hear that Kelley made your experience with Ethan Allen a delightful one and that our delivery team took it one step further. We appreciate your business!

name: Alissa Hill
text: I would never purchase from Ethan Allen for anything that has to be made like furniture! We purchase a formal dining table and ten chairs to accompany it. Not only did our table show up with a large dent underneath (unfortunately we didn’t notice until the delivery men sped away) which they refused to do anything about but we placed the order in June 2019.... it’s now October 29 we still have no chairs. Their customer service department has been zero help with figuring out why. I would expect this from Wayfair  but when you spend over 6000.00 dollars for a table and chairs you expect far superior customer service. Guess I’ve learned my lesson and will forever stay out of Ethan Allen.

resp.text:
Alissa, I am so sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to look into it further and find a resolution but I am unfortunately not able to locate your order. Was it possibly purchased under another name? Or could you provide a phone number or order number? If you wouldn't mind emailing me at laura.smith@ethanallen.com I would love to see what we can do to make this situation right.

I look forward to working with you on a resolution.

Laura

name: Hazel Summerville
text: Bought an expensive leather sleeper sofa with anvair mattress that does not work! Call and representative cam out verified slow leas in air bed. NO OTHER RESPONSE!

resp.text: Hazel, I am so sorry to hear your feedback. I reached out to the store and they confirmed that they have been in contact with you. The replacement air mattress has been ordered and they have the estimated promise date to pass along to you. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We look forward to resolving the issue.

name: Brian Calhoun
text: Ashley White was a pleasure to work with at the Hoover Ethan Allen.  It's really hard to get my wife and I on the same page when it comes to decorating.   Ashley did a great job listening to both of us as well as seeing some of our style when she came to our house for the initial assessment.  She was very patient and came up with great suggestions of things that would work well in our space and with the existing furniture we had.  At the end of the process we now have a room full of art that gives us a finished and professional look.  Thanks Ashley!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Ashley's talent as much as we do!

name: Lynn Meany
text: I bought 6 dining chairs, picked out fabric and even ordered extra fabric to make pillows with.  I received excellent service!  Everything arrived on time in perfect condition.   Top notch quality furniture, pleasant sales team, willingness to work to please you...I wouldn't hesitate to shop here again.  Thank you Lauren for all your help!

resp.text: Lynn, Thank you for the feedback! We are thrilled to hear that the experience was perfect and can't wait to work with you again.

name: Becky Charton
text: Ashley at Ethan Allen in Hoover was so patience  with my Aunt and I, she stayed late, called us back after hours and  did not hesitate when asked hard questions! After shopping all over Birmingham EA had some of the most stylish offerings with beautiful leather selections. Your prices were in line with fair market pricing giving us a high quality and a high design selection. Thanks for meeting all our needs!

resp.text: Becky, thank you so much for the feedback. We are thrilled to hear that Ethan Allen was just what you were looking for! We agree with you, Ashley is amazing! I'm happy to hear you adore her as much as we do!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We appreciate it!

name: Lisa Bice
text: Ashley White is wonderful to work with! - She is professional, intuitive and creative in her approach to pulling together furniture ideas, as well as accessories. I walked in to the store the first day knowing specific items we needed to replace, but did not even know where to begin to find what would work best for our home, with things we already have and want to keep. She asked questions, REALLY listened, and that's where her innate creativity kicked in. She has "nailed it" time after time with unique suggestions, and I look forward to working with her again as we update this home. I have not seen this 5 star level of customer service that Ashley delivers in a long time, and Ethan Allen is fortunate to have this jewel! And we LOVE our new pieces - the quality is wonderful, too! Thank you Ashley!  Lisa Bice

resp.text: Wow, Lisa thank you for this awesome review! We couldn't agree more. Ashley is amazing! We love hearing how appreciated her design service was and that you're home came together beautifully. We strive for quality products and try to ensure our clients receive nothing short of perfection. Thank you for working with us!

name: Mary Sood
text: I love Ethan Allen. They have the most beautiful furniture and accessories, and their designers are phenomenal. They have done such a great job of helping me to select and arrange my furniture and accessories. Everyone who enters my home raves!

name: Countess Fleming
text: Great customer service!  Scott Richardson is an awesome store manager.  Very attentive sales people!  I plan to be back very soon.

name: Electrical Power and Control
text: Nice

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Electrical Power And. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Susan Lewis
text: Lov Ethan Allen. Just bought a new recliner I love it

resp.text: Thank you Susan for the 5-star review! We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Thanks!

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: Whatever happened to beautiful Ethan Allen furniture? All of their furniture is ultra modern with absolutely no character, all for totally outrageous prices.

name: Leanne Dillard
text: Great service and  great selection of fine furniture and Hunter Douglas window treatments.

name: Gerald Ephraim
text: The furniture There is so nice we spent at least 18 thousand.

name: Jessica Hodges
text: he was remebering we was doing a class play of him we remeber u

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review! I'm so glad to hear that you remember the wonderful Ethan Allen! We are so honored to have our company named after such an amazing part of history.

name: Edgar A
text: Does not return calls. They lied to us on several occassions.  Gave us a receipt and when we went to pick up the item they told us the price was incorrect. They will not let us take it per the price on the reciept because it was priced incorrectly.  On a separate item we purchased did not come with the hardware.  When we asked them about it they told us they are universal screws!  Go to Lowes or Home Depot and ask for universal furniture screws!  Called corporate no help! Don't waste your time. Called Peach Tree, GA and they ordered what i needed in 3 minutes.If you want Ethan Allen go to Peach Tree, GA.  If you want better service go to Wal-Mart.

name: Michael Shelby
text: Always friendly and quality furniture.

resp.text:
Michael,
Thank you so much for the feedback!  We take a lot of pride in what we do and the items we create and love seeing comments like this so we can share with our Design Staff and our plants.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you in the Design Center soon!
Thanks, again,
Shane

name: Amy Johnston
text: Pricey. Not a great selection.

resp.text:
Thank you Amy for taking the time to leave a review. Ethan Allen is high end furniture and intended to last, we stand by our quality and craftsmanship, this is where you see the difference in the pricing from us to the other brands. The pricing is in line with the high end market for these reasons. We offer a complimentary design service with talented professional designers who are there to help as much or as little as you would like. We also offer Great, flexible finance options. Ethan Allen is always working to stay relevant with the trends but keeping our classic options still available, introducing new introductions every few months.

We appreciate you taking the time to visit our Design Center and wish you luck on you search for the right selections for your home!

name: J C-A
text: Great Furniture!

resp.text: Jocelyn, so happy you love the furniture & thank you so much for the great review! Our team at The Hoover Ethan Allen location always appreciates it!

name: lashun frizzle
text: Great

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to review us, Lashun.   Please let us know what we can do to make the experience better!  We want all Ethan Allen clients to have the very best experience possible and value your feedback!

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Great classic furniture.

name: Karen Howell
text: Great place to shop.friendly staff and great prices.anyone that is needing furniture you need to check it out.

name: Amy Smith
text: My experience was great. They have a very good selection of recliners, and I don't mean they have 10 or 12 to choose from it's more like 60 to choose from! I am very hard to please and i had a hard time narrowing it down. I came home with a very comfortable recliner and love the color that I chose. Cant wait to relax in my new chair. And cant wait to go back to Sabrina's to pick out more things for my home. ♡

name: Karen Simmons
text:
UPDATE: October 1st she issued me a full refund! Thanks

Please Be Aware Of This Business😡😡 SHARE

I purchased a brand new $800 lift chair recliner from this place. I bought it on a Saturday evening and contacted them on Monday to let them know something was wrong with the chair. They would not let me return it. It was under warranty so I had them send some one out to look at it. The guy came week 2. Agreed the whole time that something was wrong with my chair but he wasn’t sure how to fix it. He sent the report to Sabrina’s Furniture Store week 3 and she said nothing was wrong with it. I hung up and called the manufacturer in Mississippi they said the brake for the footrest was not working. Therefore my footrest slowly goes down while sitting in it. They sent me a new motor for it. I contacted Sabrina back and she was gonna send someone out to put it on. So I’ve waited all week and nobody has showed up or called. I contacted Sabrina to find out why nobody has showed up to fix it and she said the system is kicking out the maintenance order. I told her I was tired of waiting because my feet were staying swollen from not staying elevated. I also told her I would bring the chair back tomorrow and swap it out for a new one. She said they were all out of stock. So I said I would bring it back and get my money back. She agreed to it but then wanted to charge me a $200 restocking fee. Mind you this is a brand new $800 chair that has been tore up since I purchased it.

name: Joel Creasy
text: Repeat customer. Perfect every time.

name: Matthew Leonardi
text: John and Sabrina are great! More then patient with me even though it took me a long time to decide what I wanted. They waited on me hand and foot and showed excellent customer service. Unlike big companies like mattress firm they are a mom and pop shop and their business depends on the satisfaction of their customers. And trust me when I tell you they fully understand that and they will take great care of you. You would be crazy to go anywhere else, they have my business from now on.

name: Karen Herston
text: Beautiful store!!! Friendly, helpful sales person.

name: Phillip Coffman
text: Very nice place and very good selection of furniture to pick from

name: M Flowers
text: Our first experience was more than awesome, we were taken care of by Sabrina and she was great! Thank you for a great shopping!

name: Mike Clark
text: Sabrina and her husband are great people to work with.  They are not pushy and they want to help you.

name: Gary Butler
text: What a great place for furniture! What ever style or item you need, they have a wonderful selection and low prices.

name: Lori Canerday
text: Great service !!

name: Bonnie Mccullars
text: Great customer service/very friendly

name: LaJuan Johnson
text: Very courteous and friendly.

name: gwen rich
text: Great selection of furniture.

name: Eric Lopp
text: Huge selection of furniture!!

name: Corina Burlison
text: Really helpful

name: Emma Liberatore
text: My friend and I have been here twice. Susan is PHENOMENAL. We picked out a bedroom set the first time and she was great from the beginning. We went here today and nobody would help us. We were so happy to see Susan and I made sure to RUN UP to her. She will spend however much time you need and she is beyond helpful. Not only that, she has the kindest soul. We will ALWAYS ask for Susan from now on, and you should to. Don’t give up and just order online- for sure ask for Susan.

name: Betty Anderson
text: The sales person was great. My grand daughter was needing  a bedroom suite. We let her pick what she wanted. We order all the pieces we wanted. The sales lady check each individual piece to make sure it was not discontinue  before ordering. Due to covid we had to wait 3 months to get her set. The day (today) it was delivered , no end table and no chest. They said the chest which would bring all the pieces together has been discontinue. They never got ahold to us to see if we would still want it. My grand daughter is so excited, hate it that we have to tell her after waiting 3 months that it may have to go back. They have another chest that is 4 hours away but they will not send it to us or have some one go pick it up. They said I could go get it. I mean seriously I now have to be your pickup and delivery person, don't think so. Now this set  each piece is a different color and the chest was write with all the different color drawers, which is why I said it was the piece to  bring the set together. It does not even sound like this manager wants to help in making this right except to send an email to corporate. This set should of never been sent with missing pieces, who does business like this, well obviously  Rooms to Go does!!!!!

name: Leslie Burns

name: Steve Peterson
text: Ambivalent sales people, unapologetic manager, exploitative sales/"swap" policy. The suite promoted for the weekend was not available for review on the sales floor. Not a single piece. Salesperson could not explain this or the return policy so they tagged in a manager. The manager was equally stern regarding the issue, and evasive about the satisfaction policy: 48 hours to decide once delivered sight unseen, with the only option being "swap". When pressed on the issue, the manager shrugged, offered no benefit substitute or apology, and concluded the interaction. No offer to show comparable in-stock models on the sales floor, to attempt to recover from my disappointment, no offer to assist in any way. I felt like my patronage was unwanted and irrelevant. "Take what we have or don't - we don't care - but you're stuck with something once you buy." Not a direct quote, but definitely left with that impact...and unlikely to return.

text: We choose Mattress Firm because they will Give You Your Money Back if you are unhappy with your purchase. In a land of "store credit" places, they stand out. Professional, polite and efficient staff make buying from them a pleasure.

name: Miranda Edwards
text:
I originally went in to purchase a new mattress to replace my current one with. Andrew was very knowledgeable and asked questions that helped him determine which ones best suited me. He was great and not the type of guy to push you into the most expensive one on the showroom floor. After looking at several different options, he discussed the current specials they had going on. Long story short, we got to talking about us needing another mattress set and that we would be back later because we were so please. I ended up leaving the store with two mattress sets with adjustable bases for a price no other store could even touch. If you need a new set, he is the man to make a deal with.

The only negative thing I can say is that, I was a little put off by the delivery guys. The adjustable bases we tried in the store were a decent height off the ground. When they set ours up during delivery, they were extremely low to the ground. I questioned them about this and asked does the whole bed let up, because I remember them being higher off the ground. The height was so low to the ground it left a 6 inch gap between the top of the mattress and the bottom of the headboard. Their answer was no they do not make them like that and to just go buy some taller legs at a hardware store or some bed risers from walmart. After they left, low and be hold, I look in the boxes they left and what do I fine? The extensions to the legs they could have been put on when I asked about this issue. So then, I had to go next door and ask my neighbor to help me lift the frame up to attach the extenders. Glad I went ahead and did this, because I noticed they also did not put on the seventh leg at the top. The instruction book stated that this should be put on for king size beds. So now I have one bed with the extenders on correct and one that I still have to get fixed. These frames are too heavy for just one person to do by themselves. Also, I hate that they just left trash under our beds that I had to dig out. Whenever the zip ties and twist ties landed, is where they left them. They did at least take with them the plastic and boxes that the frames and mattress came in.

Overall, I am pleased with our purchase just a little disappointed with the delivery service. Had the delivery gone better, I would have given 5/5 stars. I would definitely buy from them again and recommend them to everyone else. (Hopefully the quality of product lasts a long time though and I don't have too!)

text: Took my money.  Have not had the Christmas present delivered yet.  Plenty of excuses and no refund yet.  The present was for a handicap mother.  Do not shop here.  Phone call to handicap mom stated you would refund credit card and you want to add it to the list of lies? First week, chair was not in the warehouse in Atlanta.  Second week it was raining.  Third week excuse was death in the family.  Fourth week no delivery no phone call.  You never contacted the buyer which was me.  Just made stress on the handicapped mom.  You can call me names.  I in turn will not call you names.  I will wait for the refund on the card and you have my phone number since you will not answer my call.  I will pray for you also.

name: Cheryl Smith
text: My husband and I went by Furniture and Mattress warehouse at the suggestion of my parents. They had a good experience with the owner/manager Josh Johnson so we decided to check the store out. Our visit went great, we ordered a Stearns and Foster mattress, a couch, and a chair. $1500 including delivery. Josh told us he would be going out to Atlanta the following Thursday, February 2nd, to pick up our couch and chair and have it delivered Friday or Saturday. He'd call to set up the final details. The mattress, however, he could get to us by Monday the 30th. We set up a delivery time for 3:00. Josh stated he would call me the morning of the 30th as a reminder. Up to this point, everything was great. Until Monday the 30th rolls around, it's 3:00 and there's no reminder phone call or delivery person. I call Josh and he asks if the delivery could be changed to 5:00. OK. Fine. No problem. Five o'clock rolls around. Nothing. Six o'clock. Seven o'clock. Finally, after being stood up repeatedly, my husband (the second of the two men delivery...That we paid for) helped Josh load the California-king mattress into the house. My husband is a disabled veteran and large part off his disability is his back. It is now the 9th of February and we have not received a single phone call from Josh about our couch and chair. I've called him nine times. Once while standing in front of him yesterday. He informs me that their number has changed as of that morning. Mine hadn't. He never called me. Though it expressly states, via their own contract, that if there are any shipping or delivery set backs they will contact me immediately to let me know. So, on Monday, February 6th my husband goes to the store to inquire as to what is going on. Josh tells my husband that they're having some delivery issues but we'll definitely have our furniture by Friday. He'd be giving us a call to set up a time. However, by Wednesday afternoon still no call. So, I went to the store Wednesday afternoon and Mr. Johnson tells me that we 'should' have our furniture by Tuesday. When I asked him why he hadn't kept me informed he said he was busy keeping up with his other customers and if he neglected to call he was sorry. I asked him why he hadn't returned my calls when the number has only recently changed. Surely he got them. No. He says he never got a single one of the many phone calls I made. Then I ask him if he has my number. He says he wrote it down wrong. That's funny, because he knew it when he was talking to my husband, and it's clearly written in our contract/receipt. Oh. And he tells me they're getting out of the furniture business. Be WARY, folks. Be VERY wary. All I'm asking for is common courtesy. Keep me in the loop. I'm not unreasonable. At this point, however, if I do not receive my furniture by this Tuesday I will proceed to take civil action through litigation if I am not given a full refund of the cost of the delivery fees, couch, and chair that I have paid.

text: I bought a floor model table that was on sale on a Thursday.  It was scheduled for delivery the following Saturday.  Apparently after I left, the store realized they had already sold that table.  I waited until 3pm on the day of delivery to ask where my table was.  That was when I was told that they had sold it.  They told me that they had tried to call me repeatedly.  I went to the store and showed them my phone, where I had no calls from them.  I was then told "they must have mis-dialed".  I wasted a whole day staying near my home for delivery.  It was disrespectful and shows this location is unorganized.  I will do business with the Cullman location if I ever purchase from them again.

name: Ashley Barto
text: They are so rude, tried to tell me my pay off was 1200 more than it was. They will not tell you they add 800 dollars worth of insurance to your bill either, they will do it without asking. I have had my furniture not even 3 years and it's completely broken and has holes all in it. I paid over 5 thousand dollars for bascically garbage. Don't do it. Run away from this Place, you will thank me later!

name: Brytnie Boggs
text:
If you’re looking to finance furniture or anything in that sorts go to another furniture store and do it. Some place else’s furniture will be made better and I bet their customers service is so much better also.

They have deleted my other review about things being fixed from previously. The manager at the time did fix the problem. But I made a stupid mistake by buying something else that was more exspensive thinking it would be better, now they don’t want to fix that again a few months back. On top of that I completely forgot to come in and make November’s payments (normally someone would call me between the 1st and 10th just to remind me)(I’m a mother of two and full time college student so I’m forgetful when I don’t get reminders) they called me last week while I was sitting in class so I asked them to call me back in a couple of hours to discuss why they had called. Didn’t think nothing of it. Well today I got a letter in the mail saying I was avoiding them and refusing their calls (which I have not I answer every phone calll that comes in because I never know if something might have happened to someone) then the “new manager” tried to say she delivered this letter to my house today. This letter has a stamp on it has been through the post office lines and was in my mailbox at the bottom of the box(I haven’t checked my mail in three days so it was full) but she proceeds to tell me that my account which as of today is 30days late it wasn’t 30days late when she sent this letter to me. That she would be sending it to the court house this week. And that she would not work with me because I’m 30days late as of today. That this was policy after 30 days. I worked at this store in 2017 for a while and they normally don’t send to collection until 120 days or later. She also tried to tell me they have been calling I have not received but that one call from them a little over a week ago when I asked them to call me back and they never did then my grandmother received a call from them last night and she told me today when she seen me. So hearing this plus receiving this letter today I did call them only to be told she wouldn’t work with me. I also know that when I worked there and I would help the collector there to make calls you can just click in the computer saying that you called when really you didn’t. I told her I wouldn’t be able to pay her right now Christmas is a few weeks away my sons birthday is also the week of Christmas and my car payment is due this week so I offered to pay November and December’s payment on December 28th the Friday right after the holidays she then told me I would have to pay court cost and do it that way because my account wouldn’t be there any longer.

I have been dealing with farmers for a couple of years now and I always pay my accounts off wayyy earlier than need to be.
This is also the first time I have ever been more than two days late on making a payment. I understand they want their money, but sometimes things don’t work out like that so they should really work with someone who has never been late like that. When I was employed there you still got worked with at 120 days out. It didn’t matter how late you were if they could work with you they would.

name: M
text:
They sure wanted the money real fast from me when they told me that I must pay for the mattress within a few hours of being emailed the receipt or else my order was going to have to be rescheduled. It was already enough for them to put my delivery off for over a week to begin with. I cannot even verify if the delivery guys actually showed up to my house because they didn’t even take the effort to come up and knock on my door to deliver the mattress to me. Had they done that I would have had the mattress and Mattress Firm would have had the money.

Although the store associates Bruce and Sunny were polite and respectful over the phone, as was I, I think I should have been accommodated better in terms of having the mattress delivered to me promptly than to be informed that my mattress would not be able to be delivered for another week, which now would have put me over two (2) weeks waiting to have a mattress delivered. I just didn’t get the impression that the company cares enough to want to deliver the mattress to me so therefore I requested that my money be refunded. The way I look at it, the hell with it. I’d rather keep sleeping on a bowed out mattress rather than let this company have money it doesn’t deserve.

resp.text: I am very sorry that we were not able to meet your expectations.  Should you feel led to give us another opportunity in the future, I would like to personally work with you to assure your complete satisfaction.  Best Wishes to you during this difficult time.

name: Sally Engler
text: My son and his wife have been kicked down in Brooklyn, NY where the virus has been and continues to be extremely contagious and deadly. They finally left the City to head South. They will quarantine in a small home on a river outside of BIRMINGHAM. I secured a mattress with another company at a ridiculously high price but it was available and delivery was essential. The company was not able to fulfill the payment and delivery without my presence with the credit card at the home an hour away from where I live. With just a few days before My family members’ arrival, I reached out Mattress Firm and was assured that they could find a mattress in stock and process my payment from a distance. Today, my brother will pick up the mattress from the distribution center. I saved half the cost of the Bedzxxx Express mattress and feel confident that the mattress will be comfortable and sanitary for my family.

resp.text: Thank you so much Sally.  I hope they are enjoying their stay in Alabama and staying healthy.  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Harold Watters
text:
Finally heard from the manufacture with a notice that they would replace the mattress.  No personal contact.  Received an email with instruction that I must go to the local business and handle the replacement through the local representative. I went to the local store and met with a very nice gentleman named David Paffumi.  Mr. Paffumi handled the exchange and scheduled a pick-up of the damaged mattress and set a delivery date for the exchange.  The manufacturer (company headquarters/people in charge) still need to place more importance on Customer Service.  I really appreciated the concern that Mr. Paffumi demonstrated in helping us get this matter resolved.  The management of Mattress Firm would do well to take some lessons on Customer Service from Mr. Paffumi.  My original rated of one (1) star has been changed to three (3) stars.  I hope the exchange goes well.

WOULD RATE ZERO (0) IF POSSIBLE!

Extremely poor Customer Service after the sale.  We will never purchase another mattress from this company.  They are all about making the sale, but after that you will not receive any support if you have issues.

We purchased a brand new Sleepy's Hybrid Firm mattress including adjustable electric frame and more.  A little more than $2,000.00 worth of products.

The mattress started bleeding through the cover with some sort of dye.  We contacted the local sales office and they immediately told us they could not help us with a warranty item and directed us to the manufacture.  We have been unable to speak with a real person as of this writing.  We have owned the mattress for only 8 months.  We have submitted all required information including photos to the company's website and have heard nothing as of this date.

resp.text: Hello Mr Watters.  I am very sorry to hear that you are having a difficult time with your purchase.  I would love to help out in any way that I can.  Would you please ask your salesperson to have the District Manager contact you?

name: Charla Parton
text:
There really isn't enough room here to say how outstanding the service provided by Ricky was when my mom and I stopped in close to closing on that Thursday night about three weeks ago.  Mom and I had just left visiting my Dad at the hospital and I knew Mom was past needing a new mattress. We stopped in about 7:30 that night and Ricky was fantastic.  He was patient as Mom checked out beds in our stated budget range. When she found one she liked, Ricky went above and beyond to get her new mattress to her a few days later. She is really enjoying her new bed!

Ricky and his commitment to providing exceptional customer service is just amazing, and Mattress Firm is fortunate to have Ricky representing their store. We got a great deal on a recognized national brand mattress and a person who went beyond what was expected in his role as a Mattress Firm employee. Thank you, Ricky, for helping my mom the way you did. It means more to me than I can say!

text: The sales guy, Glenn, was very helpful and did a great job answering all my questions. And ask a lot of questions. 4 stars 👍💪

name: S Wyatt
text: Excellent sales and service during purchase. Spoken down to and rudely by manager after what she thought was the final sale. Appalled and shamed, I felt like an old fool after my 3rd attempt to talk to Brittany who went from so agreeably accommodating to abrupt, in to much of a hurry to be bothered with me unless "I could keep my question VERY BRIEF as she was busy with the Labor day sale".  Phoned a few weeks later to add a queen mattress but was met with the same behavior before I was able to ask about adding a queen. Very ill I rarely leave home, I began to cry and said  I'd call another time about  adding to my purchases when she wasn't so busy. Told her my feelings were hurt and I felt chastised like a child. She did try to call me back 2 x's once I mentioned spending more $.  Having been treated so unkindly, decided to blocked the number. In all fairness, she was exemplary during the 1st purchase and I wrote a 5 star rating for my experience. She seemed upset at how lengthy and detailed it was but I only tried to cover all the horrible things she said she'd suffered from another customer who frightened and wrote badly about her. She was so upset about it that my adult mentally disabled daughter worried, prayed and asked me to check on her safety several times after our visit/purchase. I'm sorry if I embarrassed her. She was very direct about my lengthy rating stating she didn't have time to read it when I asked if I covered everything she asked me to. Confused and ashamed I will not go back to that store. To EVERYONE reading this: you never know when you'll be old, sick, unable to look and feel good due to illness. Try to remember that one day you'll be on the other side of the desk.

name: Angela Walker
text: Worst experience ever. Brittany was extremely rude and unprofessional.  She had the door locked during normal business hours, open sign was on and all the lights were on in the store. After myself and three other customers kept knocking on the doors and windows and she would not come to the door, we became concerned for her safety. We all called the store repeatedly and no one would answer. We finally called another store to see if they could get in touch with her and she would not answer for them either. That store manager finally called their district manager who called the store and she finally answered. About 10 minutes later she finally came out of the back room appearing like she had just woken up. She immediately opened the door with an attitude and stated "someone is trying to get me in trouble calling my district manager, I was here by myself and in the back room". We attempted to tell her given the area and the fact that all the lights were on, open sign was on and that we noticed a car parked there that we were concerned for her safety. She continued with the attitude. I told her that there were 3 other customers there who had left and she replied "well that's their problem, they can go somewhere else". We told her 5 times what we were looking for and she repeatedly asked what we needed. We finally left, only to be chased out the door by her stating "ya'll see I was here....my car is parked right there. There was no reason to call my boss and tell him I wasn't here".  I again told her that we were just concerned for her safety and she continued to run her mouth at us outside the store. Well, to me if you were there then you should have had the door unlocked and certainly shouldn't have had the attitude you did with me about the other customers leaving. I personally would appreciate someone being concerned about my safety if I did not come to the door after repeated calls and knocks on the doors and windows when we clearly read that the store was supposed to be open. I  did get a call back from the District Manager, Bruce, who was very nice, and thanked us for being concerned about her safety even when she was not appreciative of that to us. I took my money elsewhere. I see other people have good reviews about the store, and maybe this was just a fluke, but it was a very odd situation to say the least.  I was also told by the District Manager that she has caller ID in the store, and that is likely why she answered his call and not anyone else's. I am only giving one star for the fact that the District Manager called me back and was very professional, apologetic and appreciative of my concerns.

It was my decision to upgrade to a higher quality mattress, and I am glad I did it, and we got free next-day delivery.

Well they failed to address before I even got the mattress about their return policy.  You have to wait 30 days before returning it and they charge you a 150 fee for pick up and cleaning. They can't take it back unless they pick it up!!  Even thought mine was a twin size.

In the end God was good, because we ended up donating it and let the Rescue mission know to give it a good clean :)  Praise God he can make a bad situation good.

He then got an attitude when I told him the budget we were looking for and said “I don’t care what you but I get paid regardless” very contradictory. Went to the store to dispute it and all they could tell me that their credit check is a credit application... we sign on a house Friday and may not get our house now when the bank does a soft check. Not saying don’t shop there, saying don’t use Brandon.

name: Radar ATC
text: Purchased two (2) Serta Kozma Twin XL Mattresses from MattressFirm in Dothan, AL.  During the sale the salesman said many time if we find a better price else ware, let them know and they will refund the difference.  I went home, went on the MattressFirm web site and realized I paid over $70 more than the web purchase.  The salesman said he would refund the difference (which they did 3 weeks later).  I then went to a local competitor and found the same mattresses for over $300 cheaper.  I went back to the salesman and he told me they were not the same mattresses.  He said the memory gel was "better" on his model.  A little background here, Serta make mattresses and different retailers put different names on the SAME mattress.  This is the case here.  MattressFirm named the Serta Mattress "Kozma" where other places named it "Kellerman".  It is the SAME Mattress.  I even called Serta Corporate and they confirmed.  I commented to the salesman that it would be more advantages for me to give MattressFirm the $79 to come and get their mattresses and then purchase them at the other retailer.  The sales guy called me "an extortionist" and I politely said it was about getting the best price on the SAME mattress.  Once I mentioned (in email traffic) that I would be contacting Serta Corporate to see if the were the SAME Mattress, the salesman said they would refund me $300 more on the sale (which they did 3 weeks later).  Here is what MattressFirm WON'T tell you.  They will only match ADVERTISED  prices of their competitors.  They will not honor quotes.  The ONLY advantage to purchasing a mattress from MattressFirm is that you can give them $79 to come and get the mattress if you absolutely hate it.  Here is my advice.  DO YOUR HOME WORK.  Compare the specs of the mattress you want and then shop around.  On a good note (hence the 2 Stars), we LOVE the mattress.  Very comfortable and this is a customer that was sleeping on a Tempurpedic.  4 Stars for the Mattress.  1 Star for my sales experience averages to 2 Stars.  Good Luck in your search for a comfortable night sleep.

text: Jonathan offered exemplary customer service!  All the staff were very friendly and welcoming.

name: Anthony Busby
text: Product seems to be to be great won’t receive it for a few weeks. After what I experienced in the store I’m confident it will be worth it but this review is solely on the store. Never thought I would enjoy shopping for a mattress and certainly never dreamed I would spend th money we spent but the staff never once made me feel pressured. Tika was our tour guide and I use that term because that’s what it was a guided interactive tour. There was another gentleman working with her who was very friendly but I don’t recall his name but from the sounds of it his customers were enjoying the experience as well. There’s eight different models with various thickness and materials and they let you try out every single on of them but the first setup was our ultimate choice. It was really amazing to watch the screen above your head. You see your pressure points in real time and can see literally see your optimum sleep number. If your considering a new mattress don’t let the prices scare you away from Atleast experiencing it first hand. I never dreamed I would spend more on a bed than I did my last used car but as a sufferer from chronic back pain I was willing to make the investment after visiting this store but again never felt pressured by the staff. I can’t shut up about this place to my friends

name: Jennifer Calfee
text: My husband and I had a great experience at the sleep number store at Hwy 280, Birmingham, Al. The salesperson was extraordinarily helpful and knowledgeable about all of the beds.

name: Tyler Hayes
text: The sales associate that helped us (Grant) did a wonderful job showing us our options and explaining the products to us. He was very informative and answered all our questions. He’s a great salesman who really cares about his customers. 10/10 would recommend him to anyone interested in a Sleep Number bed.

name: Cathy Peoples
text: I had the most amazing experience at my local Sleep Number Store. I only went in to find out more about the mattresses and how they work. I had done my internet research but was ready for the touch test. Grant was my salesperson and he was very pleasant and informative. After about an hour in the store needless to say we were sold and purchased our first Sleep Number bed!! So excited waiting on my delivery!!

name: Beverly Moore
text: We had a great experience at the sleep number store in Birmingham. The salesman was so helpful and answered all our questions completely. I would recommend this store to anyone who is considering a sleep number bed.

name: Susan Slaney
text: Jonathan and Raul were extremely helpful and pleasant. They made our shopping experience enjoyable and comfortable. They were very knowledgeable and answered our many questions with ease. We were able to use the information they provided to make the best decision for our needs.

name: B J
text:
I had a wonderful experience purchasing my sleep number 360 and accessories at the Birmingham Home Show.  It was extremely busy. I tested beds while waiting.  Johnathan, the store manager for HWY 280, was great.  He was very accommodating.  He brought my paperwork to the bedside.  What he didn’t know was that I suffer with my lower back and sciatic nerve area.  I was hurtin. The mattress felt so good, I didn’t want to get up and start feeling yucky again which is the reason I asked him to bring the paperwork over to me.  My cousin and my friend with me tested a mattress too. I think my friend who has trouble sleeping will buy a mattress soon.  I purchased her a curved pillow and a wedge.
I am also grateful for the patience and kindness shown to me.  Saturday was my first day out of the house.  Johnathan did not know this, but my older brother died January 24, 2020 of metastatic cancer. I took leave from my job to take care of him. I am still in shock. He died three months after his diagnosis. Johnathan made me laugh.  I didn’t panic or experience any anxiety.   I highly encourage people to visit the HWY 280 store and check out Sleep Number beds.  I switched from a Tempur Pedic to a Sleep Number bed.  One mission accomplished.

name: James Davis
text: The staff at the store were welcoming and attentive. They were willing to answer questions and helped us in every step of the purchase!

name: Eric Tipton
text: Brenda and Shawn at the Hwy 280 store have been the most helpful sales associates I've encountered during any bedding purchase. They were very knowledgeable about the Sleep Number product and helpful in choosing a model to suit our needs. No attempt to oversell whatsoever....just honest caring individuals. I highly recommend this store and these two associates. Thank you both.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your wonderful experience and are so glad you found some great options to help you get your best night's sleep!

name: Eric Kelly
text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS BED! Extremely uncomfortable for the cost & TERRIBLE customer service.  Was in a rush when purchasing and was 'told' the bed could be returned, so we bought the top of the line bed** ONLY THE MATTRESS CAN BE RETURNED. Paid over $11,000 for the bed initially and was told we would have to keep the base, which costs over $4,000.  Initially the wrong bed delivered, which was like a brick, and the foot warmer was missing. Two weeks later, got the correct mattress and foot warmer.  Would have been better off buying an air mattress and placing it on box springs. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE to say the least.

text: 1 of 5 stars. The sales person took down the wrong zip code for my address and when I made him aware of that he said he would get it changed. Fast forward two weeks to the delivery day and come to find out he did not change the zip code to the correct one so my bed ended up in West Virginia instead of Alabama. The bed was then send back to the warehouse and allocated to someone else. So now with it would be another 4 weeks before it would be delivered. I get a call 10 days prior to the delivery date with them saying it would be delivered the following day and they don't show up. The online customer service has been decent but product fulfilment is terrible.

name: Joanna Knight
text: I visited the store in Troy, AL   I specifically told the sales clerk that I wanted to purchase a living room suit on the no interest plan.  This was on a Saturday and she gathered my information.  She sent it in and told me initially that I was denied.  After review, she indicated that the denial was on an old address.  Once she entered my correct address she told me I was approved.  She asked me did I want to make a down payment but did not indicate that the interest free was subject to a down payment.  So, I declined to make a down payment.  Upon receiving my first statement it indicated I was charged interest.  When I talked to the same lady she indicated that approved the account that charged interest.  No, I did not.  She neglected to give me the full details.

resp.text:
Customer service is incredibly important to us, and we regret we didn't provide you with the
experience you expected, Joanna. If there is anything we can do differently that might better serve you as
our valued customer, please reach out to a member of our corporate team by calling 1-800-223-
2625 or email customer.service@badcock.com

name: Valerie Edelmann
text:
Needed to purchase a lift chair that can also be laid back far enough to sleep in it for my husband. Due to my own health issues,  I  needed to call prior to going into the store to get as much information as possible about the choices. A wonderful young lady named "Turtle" helped me on the phone.But she wouldn't be there when I could be there. She told me her sister would be there and Mechel would make sure Turtle got credit for the sale. (I had wanted Turtle to get the credit since she took so much time helping me.) When we got there to the store, Mechel was so sweet and ready to help. We ended up purchasing 2 matching chairs to be delivered on Friday! (He has impending hip surgery and I need knee surgery.)

In a time when customer service has decreased and prices have increased, the quality customer service at our Badcock's is greatly appreciated!

resp.text: It was a pleasure to have you shop with us, Valerie! Thank you for taking the time to rate our store and share your feedback.

text:
Kat was simply amazing in helping me out. I have issues sleeping hot, even with "cold" mattresses and stuff. She recommended the dual zone system and after last night, my first night with it, I can say it's worth every penny.
The best part is she helped work out 0% financing so I could not only get the dual zone, but not break the bank doing it.

10/10 would recommend this place!!!

text: I have owned a sleep number bed for about 6 months now. I still cringe a little at how much we spent but if he sleeps soft and you sleep hard then this bed is the best for your marriage. I am asleep number 100 and my husband is asleep number 40. What a difference and this is the only bed that would allow us to do that. But that price though.

text: Our visit to the Sleep Number Store in Dothan, Ala. Was Awesome! We learned all about the smart 360 bed and how to use it. The staff was amazing, very informative, friendly,  made us feel very special from the first moment we step through the door. Benji was GREAT!! We can hardly wait for our bed to be delivered. We went in the store to check the bed out really not intending on buying that day, but after the demonstration and we tried the bed we were sold and bought one before we look left the store.

name: scott dunnivan
text: Good people to deal with very helpful

name: millie cp
text: My husband and I just bought our sleep number bed and pillows with salesman Benji's help. He was professional, patient, knowledgeable, and brilliant. He was super friendly and helpful, never pushed anything on us, made sure all our needs were meet; he didn't just sell us a bed, he helped give us back our restful nights. After having been injured in a bad car wreck last year, my husband had already bought me a new adjustable bed with every pillow you can imagine for help with my neck pain since the surgery to correct the injury. Nothing helped. With Benji's guidance, I now feel like one day I'll wake up and not even realize i slept through the night, something I now believe I took for granted in my youth. I would recommend these beds to anyone, and suggest Benji get a raise and a promotion for his excellent service.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your review with us, Millie. We love hearing when our Sales Professionals have provided wonderful service and we'll make sure your kind words are shared with Benji's supervisor :-)

text: I have had nothing but problems. The foot warmers have been replaced three times. Once you get your bed, the local store is no help.

resp.text: We're sorry you've had trouble with your bed, Brian. While our stores can assist with ordering new items, when it comes to servicing those products, our Customer Service Team is the best form of assistance. We hope you'll give us a call at 1-888-411-2270 from 8AM-8PM CST M-F or from 8:30AM-5PM on Saturdays, so we can review your concerns, and see how we can best help.

text: I went to the register to purchase a framed wall decor piece that was in a section with a 30% off wall decor and I was not given the discount. Lady at register rang it up full price and when I asked her about the 30% off, she went to go look at sign and said, "oh they must have not removed it. I'll get my manager to fix it." Manager approaches me and says, "It has writing on it. It's only for certain ones." I did not get the discount, so therefore left and will not return...

name: Emily Mitchell
text: I ordered 3 side tables online to be delivered to our local Kirkland’s. I received an email a week later saying “order canceled.” I called our local store in Huntsville, Al and she said the there was one an hour away and 2 tables at another store 2 1/2 hours away and said sorry. Soooo, no way to get those tables here at our store? She said, no sorry and I guess the warehouse is out. So that’s it. Not great communication either way online or in store and still no side tables. Will be purchasing elsewhere now due to lack of customer service and inventory stock.

My only suggestion is to have a step stool there, Mom had a hard time climbing in and off the beds. But thank you for the wonderful service.

name: Katie Yang Sloan
text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!! We had been on the market for a new mattress and had visited multiple other mattress stores in the Huntsville area, but didn't find what we were looking for, at the price we wanted. Upon walking into this store, I was warmly greeted by Debbie who was very helpful and gave a great price quote for a mattress I loved. I brought my husband back with me the next day and worked with Sunny, and she was just as pleasant, extremely knowledgeable, and patient with us. She did a "sleep test" with us and educated us on the differences, pressure point relief, and pros/cons of a plush vs medium mattress.  We ended up deciding on a mattress and got an adjustable base and all the extras for a great price (they are currently running a free adjustable base!!)! I would definitely recommend this location and their sales people to anyone looking for a new mattress!!

text: Debbie and Julian were so helpful.  We needed a couple of beds fast because we just moved here and they got us situated, in and out in 45 minutes, and were so nice!  I would recommend this store!  Plus, the beds are very comfortable.

name: Ali Lemmond
text: Julian was a huge help in purchasing our new mattress! We initially visited the Whitsburg location where Julian helped us pick a mattress that we both loved. We have different preferences in firmness so he showed us a few optons that met both our needs. We needed to think about it overnight and there was absolutely zero pressure to buy right away. Julian was so helpful that we decided to go back the very next day and purchase it. He was at the Bridgestreet location the next day so we went there. He was able to add the military discount on top of the quote from the previous day which helped lower the cost even more. He was a huge help from beginning to end and we would definitely recommend him to everyone!!

name: Anthony Wiegand
text: My Husband and I have been really wanting to upgrade our mattress and decided to stop in to mattress firm to get some prices. I saw online that they were having a sale and Ms Debbie was so helpful! Friday night I stopped in myself while I was on that side of town and she was so helpful and gave me some prices and information on financing. We came back today together so my husband could try the mattress and wound up buying it on the spot. Debbie is the kind of representative every company needs! I am so glad that we decided to go somewhere other than Ashley Furniture (we have had some problems with their service in the past)  Thank you so much Ms Debbie! We will absolutely be buying our next mattress from this location!

name: DeAnna Garcia
text: My Husband and I went tonight to just browse around and test out some Mattresses.  DeVonta was super helpful when it came to helping us choose the perfect mattress. He was really friendly and professional.  I always like going to places where I dont feel like they are ripping me off. I knew 100% we were getting an honest deal. I highly recommend this location!
